text: int main ( ) { int T , i , n , j , x , y , count , flag = 0 ; int ar [ 100000 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < T ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ j ] ) ; count = 0 ; for ( x = 0 ; x < n ; x ++ ) { for ( j = x ; j < n ; j ++ ) { flag = 0 ; for ( y = x ; y < j ; y ++ ) { if ( ar [ y ] <= ar [ y + 1 ] ) flag ++ ; else { flag = 0 ; break ; } } if ( flag > 0 ) count ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , count + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
